author: Special Correspondent
text:
In a shocking incident, a 55-year-old man, suspected to be mentally ill, allegedly killed his wife with a vegetable cutter in Peraiyur, near here on Wednesday.

Madurai Rural Police said that Rajamani and his wife Thangathai (52) were running a tea shop in the locality. The couple had three sons and two daughters. Of late, Rajamani was behaving in an odd manner and had turned violent. Sometimes, he even slapped his wife over petty issues.

When such was the case, he had allegedly stabbed his wife with the vegetable cutter, used in the tea shop.

In a serious condition, the victim was rushed to the government hospital and subsequently to Madurai Government Rajaji Hospital. However, she died.

Peraiyur police registered a case of murder and arrested Rajamani, a police officer said.
title: Man suspected to be ‘mentally ill’ kills wife
